acceptance_criteria: FeedbackSection UI component in InfoModal/MobileInfoContent with 4 feedback links
commandmate issue CLI command with gh CLI integration (create/search/list)
commandmate docs CLI command for documentation retrieval
AI tool integration guide in commandmate init output
gh CLI as optional dependency in cli-dependencies.ts
Security: input validation, label sanitization, path traversal prevention
DRY: Centralized GitHub URLs in src/config/github-links.ts
implementation_tasks: Task 1.1-1.6: Config layer (github-links.ts, cli-dependencies, security-messages, ai-integration-messages)
Task 3.1-3.5: CLI commands (issue.ts, docs.ts, init.ts update, index.ts update)
Task 6.1-6.7: Unit tests for all new/modified modules
